info.title: Träwelling API
info.description: Träwelling user API description. This is an incomplete documentation with still many errors.

get.summary: [Auth optional] Get basic information for event
get.description: Returns slug, name and duration for an event

404.description: No Event found for this id

get.summary: [Auth optional] Get additional information for event
get.description: Returns overall travelled distance and duration for an event

get.summary: [Auth optional] Get paginated statuses for event
get.description: Returns all for user visible statuses for an event

404.description: No Event found for this id

get.summary: [Auth optional] Shows upcoming events with basic information
get.description: Returns slug, name and duration for an event

404.description: No Event found for this id

get.summary: Get paginated future statuses of current user
get.description:
Returns paginated statuses of the authenticated user, that are more than 20 minutes in the
     *      future
Returns all currently active statuses that are visible to the (un)authenticated user
Returns a single status Object, if user is authorized to see it

confirmation.title: confirmation
confirmation.description:
Username of the to be deleted account (needs to match the currently logged in
     *                  user)

409.description: Conflict. This should not happen but it tries to prevent a 500.

403.description: User not authorized to do this action

get.summary: [Auth optional] Get paginated statuses for single user
get.description: Returns paginated statuses of a single user specified by the username

begin.title: begin
begin.description: Timestamp for the start of the event

end.title: end
end.description: Timestamp for the end of the event

trainDistance.title: trainDistance
trainDistance.description: Total travelled distance for this event in meters

trainDuration.title: trainDuration
trainDuration.description: Total travelled duration for this event in minutes

begin.title: begin
begin.description: Timestamp for the start of the event

end.title: end
end.description: Timestamp for the end of the event

first.title: first
first.description: URL to first page of this pagination

last.title: last
last.description: URL to last page of this pagination (mostly null)

prev.title: prev
prev.description: URL to previous page of this pagination (mostly null)

next.title: next
next.description: URL to next page of this pagination (mostly null)

current_page.title: current_page
current_page.description: currently displayed page in this pagination

from.title: from
from.description: The first element on this page is the nth element of the query

per_page.title: per_page
per_page.description: the amount of items per page in this pagination

to.title: to
to.description: The last element on this page is the nth element of the query

Polyline.title: Polyline
Polyline.description: Polyline of a single status as GeoJSON Feature

preventIndex.title: preventIndex
preventIndex.description: Did the user choose to prevent search engines from indexing their profile?

likes.title: likes
likes.description: How many people have liked this status

liked.title: liked
liked.description: Did the currently authenticated user like this status? (if unauthenticated = false)

1.description: Array of stopovers. Key describes trip id

distance.title: distance
distance.description: travelled distance of this checkin in meters

duration.title: duration
duration.description: time traveled in this checkin in minutes

speed.title: speed
speed.description: speed of this checkin in kph

rilIdentifier.title: rilIdentifier
rilIdentifier.description: Identifier specified in 'Richtline 100' of the Deutsche Bahn

rilIdentifier.title: rilIdentifier
rilIdentifier.description: Identifier specified in 'Richtline 100' of the Deutsche Bahn

arrival.title: arrival
arrival.description: currently known arrival time. Equal to arrivalReal if known. Else equal to arrivalPlanned.

arrivalPlanned.title: arrivalPlanned
arrivalPlanned.description: planned arrival according to timetable records

arrivalReal.title: arrivalReal
arrivalReal.description: real arrival according to live data

arrivalPlatformPlanned.title: arrivalPlatformPlanned
arrivalPlatformPlanned.description: planned arrival platform according to timetable records

arrivalPlatformReal.title: arrivalPlatformReal
arrivalPlatformReal.description: real arrival platform according to live data

departure.title: departure
departure.description:
currently known departure time. Equal to departureReal if known. Else equal to
     *     departurePlanned.

departurePlanned.title: departurePlanned
departurePlanned.description: planned departure according to timetable records

departureReal.title: departureReal
departureReal.description: real departure according to live data

departurePlatformPlanned.title: departurePlatformPlanned
departurePlatformPlanned.description: planned departure platform according to timetable records

departurePlatformReal.title: departurePlatformReal
departurePlatformReal.description: real departure platform according to live data

isArrivalDelayed.title: isArrivalDelayed
isArrivalDelayed.description: Is there a delay in the arrival time?

isDeparutreDelayed.title: isDepartureDelayed
isDeparutreDelayed.description: Is there a delay in the departure time?

profilePicture.title: profilePicture
profilePicture.description: URL of the profile picture of the user

trainDistance.title: trainDistance
trainDistance.description: distance travelled by train in meters

trainDuration.title: trainDuration
trainDuration.description: duration travelled by train in minutes

trainSpeed.title: trainSpeed
trainSpeed.description: average speed travelled by train in meters

points.title: points
points.description: Current points of the last 7 days

twitterUrl.title: twitterUrl
twitterUrl.description: URL to the Twitter profile of the user

mastodonUrl.title: mastodonUrl
mastodonUrl.description: URL to the Mastodon profile of the user

privateProfile.title: privateProfile
privateProfile.description: is this profile set to private?

privacyHideDays.title: privacyHideDays
privacyHideDays.description: Hide all statuses after x days

userInvisibleToMe.title: userInvisibleToMe
userInvisibleToMe.description: Can the currently authenticated user see the statuses of this user?

muted.title: muted
muted.description: Is this user muted by the currently authenticated user?

following.title: following
following.description: Does the currently authenticated user follow this user?

followPending.title: followPending
followPending.description: Is there a currently pending follow request?

preventIndex.title: preventIndex
preventIndex.description: Did the user choose to prevent search engines from indexing their profile?

body.title: body
body.description: Status-Text to be displayed alongside the checkin
body.example: Wow. This train is extremely crowded!

BusinessEnum.title: Business
BusinessEnum.description: What type of travel (0=private, 1=business, 2=commute) did the user specify?

VisibilityEnum.title: visibility
VisibilityEnum.description:
What type of visibility (0=public, 1=unlisted, 2=followers, 3=private, 4=authenticated) did the
 *     user specify?
